description:
Upon their return to West Udogawa, the members of Zvezda discover to find their base destroyed.  The Governor of Tokyo has dispatched his special forces to eliminate Zvezda.  With their base in shambles, Zvezda has no choice but to go into hiding.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Incident sur le champ de bataille
Not All Quiet on the West Udogawa Front
西ウド川戦線異状あり
